title: Papua and New Guinea, 1967
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Douglas White
brief_description: An overall survey of the Territories, emphasising economic, political and social development. Shows scenes of town and village life, local government and the House of Assembly, health and education and industries.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Douglas White
description: An overall survey of the Territories, emphasising economic, political and social development. Shows scenes of town and village life, local government and the House of Assembly, health and education and industries.
